[@Avinash](@1APMt97diJmNPAmbKrfQChgFkuLWrJ6CKLPhGS2u7cY=.ed25519) Oh, I *also* have that issue, it's just intermittent.  I opened [an issue on GitHub about this](https://github.com/ssbc/patchbay/issues/274) yesterday but since nobody said anything I thought I was the only one.

[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) Is this the problem you were talking about?
